column2: Blackberry not a strategic fit for us -SAP CFO in magazine FRANKFURT
column3: Oct 26 German business software group SAP is not interested in bidding for troubled smart phone maker Blackberry
column4: its chief financial officer told a German magazine.

column2: GE drops legal fight over running tar sands megaloads on Idaho highway SALMON
column4: Oct 25 A General Electric Co subsidiary has dropped its appeal of a federal court order barring a massive shipment of tar sands oil-field equipment from being trucked along a scenic Idaho roadway that cuts through the Indian homelands of the Nez Perce Tribe.
